title: I stopped playing the violin two years ago. What are some suggestions to pick it up quickly? - Quora

response.answer_text: First suggestion I have is find a teacher/tutor and a group to play with.  The former will help you the most in making sure you're doing/remembering things right, and the latter will give you a reason to keep practicing and working on things along with new friends who are also interested in music and playing together!
